title: 1945 Navy Typefaces?
content:
Greetings!

I have a friend who's getting a tattoo, and was interested in finding out what kind of typefaces the Navy around 1945. Thought I'd post here to see if any of you guys had any ideas :)

Thanks!

Elizabeth
author: singingshanti

comments.content:
A better reference might be Norman "Sailor Jerry" Collins' flash. You can buy books of his drawings for tattoo designs on Amazon.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020132312im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jerry_4441.jpg)
